We collect and store the path of the file you are editing, timestamps, project names, branch names, editor names & versions, languages, libraries/imports from opened files, line counts of opened files, position of your cursor in opened files, your computer's hostname, your computer's timezone, your computer's operating system name and version information, and websites visited in your browser from your usage of our downloadable plugins .

We use cookies with unique identifiers to authenticate your login session.
